search.label: Search
search.message: You can search using a name or by entering a direct link.

construction.title: Under Construction!
construction.description: This section is still under development. Come back soon to see the updates.

kick.sub-gifter: {count, plural, =0 {Sub Gifter} one {Gifted # Sub} other {Gifted # Subs}}

hero.subtitle: Your unified hub for chat elements across streaming platforms.
hero.description: Discover emotes, badges, and channels from Twitch, YouTube, Kick, and popular third-party extensions in one organized place.

platforms.title: Supported Platforms
platforms.subtitle: We support major streaming platforms and popular third-party extensions.

providers.title: Comprehensive Data Sources
providers.subtitle: We collect and organize data from trusted community-driven sources to provide you with origin information for emotes and badges, plus detailed guides on how to obtain them.
providers.community_description: Our information comes from two trusted community-driven providers that maintain comprehensive databases of chat elements and their origins.
providers.contribute_message: These platforms are powered by community contributions, so we encourage you to contribute to their respective websites to help keep the data accurate and up-to-date.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Comprehensive tools for chat element discovery and organization.

emotes.title: Emotes Collection
emotes.description: Browse thousands of emotes including exclusive limited editions like Hype Train, global emotes, subscription tiers, deleted emotes, and special event collections.

badges.title: Badge Directory
badges.description: View global badges from different platforms, including third-party badges, subscription tiers, special achievements, and event commemoratives.

channels.title: Channel Search
channels.description: Find channels and their specific chat elements, subscription perks, and available emotes across all supported platforms.

organized.title: Well Organized
organized.description: Everything categorized and easy to find.

free.title: Completely Free
free.description: No hidden costs or subscriptions. All without ads.

footer.disclaimer: We are not affiliated with any streaming platform or third-party emote service. We simply collect publicly accessible information for educational and informational purposes.
